ygData.subject: Re: Skill Level Cap
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I was just getting ready to start looking into this.  I made 16 a few days ago.  If there s still a cap, then I won t be able to gain any skill yet. I ve
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, Feb 01, 2000 at 09:59:21AM -0500, Madgrizzle wrote:
> Not sure if this has been addressed, but is there still a skill level cap
> based upon level? I've been using a 29 wizard to learn tinkering but I
> don't play him anymore so he won't likely go up in level anymore. I'm
> approaching the point where the cap could come into effect and I don't want
> to blow money if I'm not going to gain any points.

I was just getting ready to start looking into this. I made 16 a few days
ago. If there's still a cap, then I won't be able to gain any skill yet.
I've got a bit of cash saved up, and was going to head over to Steamfont and
see what happened when I started tinkering. I'll let you know.

Joe D
